summary: The module implements a custom consistency decoder architecture and associated building blocks (residual blocks, up/down‑sampling layers, image embedding/unembedding, timestep embeddings) and provides utilities for converting and loading such models into the Hugging Face Diffusers framework.
business_intent: Allow developers to transform and integrate consistency‑decoder based diffusion models into standard Diffusers pipelines, enabling inference and further fine‑tuning with familiar APIs.
